import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem continued_fraction_determinant_relations {p q : ℕ → ℤ} {a : ℕ → ℤ} (h_recur_p : ∀ n : ℕ, n ≥ 2 → p n = a n * p (n - 1) + p (n - 2)) (h_recur_q : ∀ n : ℕ, n ≥ 2 → q n = a n * q (n - 1) + q (n - 2)) (h_p0 : p 0 = 1) (h_p1 : p 1 = a 1) (h_q0 : q 0 = 0) (h_q1 : q 1 = 1) (n m : ℕ) (h_n_ge_0 : n ≥ 0) (h_n_le_m : n ≤ m) :
    (p n * q (n - 1) - q n * p (n - 1) = (-1)^(n - 1)) ∧
    (n ≥ 2 → p n * q (n - 2) - q n * p (n - 2) = (-1)^n * a n) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• The sequences (p_k) and (q_k) are defined by recurrence relations and initial values [def_1].
Therefore, we conclude:
• For n=0, the equations hold: p_0 q_{-1} - q_0 p_{-1} = (-1)^{-1} and p_0 q_{-2} - q_0 p_{-2} = (-1)^0 a_0 [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
by_cases hn_cases : n = 0
  . have h_first_eq : p n * q (n - 1) - q n * p (n - 1) = (-1)^(n - 1) := by
      rw [hn_cases]
      simp only [sub_self, mul_zero, h_p0, h_q0]
      norm_num
    have h_second_eq_triv : (n ≥ 2 → p n * q (n - 2) - q n * p (n - 2) = (-1)^n * a n) := by
      intro h_n_ge_2
      rw [hn_cases] at h_n_ge_2
      norm_num at h_n_ge_2
    exact ⟨h_first_eq, h_second_eq_triv⟩

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem continued_fraction_determinant_relations {p q : ℕ → ℤ} {a : ℕ → ℤ} (h_recur_p : ∀ n : ℕ, n ≥ 2 → p n = a n * p (n - 1) + p (n - 2)) (h_recur_q : ∀ n : ℕ, n ≥ 2 → q n = a n * q (n - 1) + q (n - 2)) (h_p0 : p 0 = 1) (h_p1 : p 1 = a 1) (h_q0 : q 0 = 0) (h_q1 : q 1 = 1) (n m : ℕ) (h_n_ge_0 : n ≥ 0) (h_n_le_m : n ≤ m) :
    (p n * q (n - 1) - q n * p (n - 1) = (-1)^(n - 1)) ∧
    (n ≥ 2 → p n * q (n - 2) - q n * p (n - 2) = (-1)^n * a n) := by
  by_cases hn_cases : n = 0
  . have h_first_eq : p n * q (n - 1) - q n * p (n - 1) = (-1)^(n - 1) := by
      rw [hn_cases]
      simp only [sub_self, mul_zero, h_p0, h_q0, pow_neg_succ_of_nat, one_mul, neg_mul, sub_zero]
      norm_num
    have h_second_eq_triv : (n ≥ 2 → p n * q (n - 2) - q n * p (n - 2) = (-1)^n * a n) := by
      intro h_n_ge_2
      rw [hn_cases] at h_n_ge_2
      norm_num at h_n_ge_2
    exact ⟨h_first_eq, h_second_eq_triv⟩
  sorry
